summary: Small cooperative or research facility. Energy equivalent to 15 homes. Payback period: 8-10 months.
Regional greenhouse cluster. 1.74 GWh saved annually. Removes 159 cars equivalent. Creates 5-10 tech jobs.
National deployment. 17.4 GWh saved (0.04% of Germany agriculture energy). Equivalent to 580 acres of forest carbon sequestration.
